subtitle: Traditional halloumi cheese wrapped in  bacon and served  with salad, aubergines and  plum tomatoes in a Greek yogurt dressing - delicious!  Great for a starter or main course.

method.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Mix half the olive oil with the garlic.
Put aubergines and tomatoes onto a baking sheet (cut side uppermost) and roast for 10 min.
Take vegetables out of oven and drizzle over olive oil and garlic mixture.
Wrap bacon around the slices of halloumi cheese and put in oven with the vegetables for another 20 min.
Mix remaining olive oil with balsamic vinegar and basil leaves.

Arrange salad leaves on serving plates with tomatoes, aubergines and halloumi cheese on top.  Sprinkle half the basil oil over the dish and add the remaining yogurt.  Pour this dressing into a serving jug or over each individual plate.
Season well and sprinkle on a little paprika to taste.

title: Pan-fried halloumi with roasted vegetables
